oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Presentations from the Workshop on Data Collection in Organic Agriculture, held at the 17th IFOAM Organic World Congress
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Willer, Helga
Mitchell, Alexandra
Ong, Kung Wai
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Surveys and statistics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: At this workshop the following papers were presented and discussed * Data collection on organic agriculture world-wide Status of collection activities, tools developed. Helga Willer, FiBL * Collection of data on the domestic market: Case Study Japan. Heinz Kuhlmann, BioFach Japan * Collection of data on the domestic market: Case study Australia. Alexandra Mitchell, University of Armidale Australia * Data collection on organic agriculture in Asia. Current status. Ong Kung Wai, IFOAM World Board
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Willer, Helga; Mitchell, Alexandra and Ong, Kung Wai (2011) Presentations from the Workshop on Data Collection in Organic Agriculture, held at the 17th IFOAM Organic World Congress. Workshop at: 17th IFOAM Organic World Congress, Namyangju Sports & Culture Center, Namyangju City, Gyeonggi Province, Republic of Korea, September 28 to October 2, 2011. [Completed]
